Content.Text:
<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
Good day to you! Is this <MYNAME>'s
residence?
<PAGE>
My name is <BLUE>Walter</BLUE>, and I'm here today
representing our Travel Agency.
<PAGE>
I heard from Miss Veronica that this town was
bustling with wonderful couples, so I stopped
by to visit.
<PAGE>
For years, our agency has specialized in vacation
packages for married couples. We come highly
recommended by our satisfied customers.
<PAGE>
We plan new and fun vacation packages every
year. I'll come by regularly with new packages
personalized just for you.

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
Good day to you, <MYNAME>! I just wanted to
drop by with this new vacation package tailored
just for you.

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
This year's destination is the charming
<BLUE><MOJI0> Country</BLUE>, yours for the low,
low price of just <BLUE><MOJI1></BLUE>G.

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
Would you like to sign up for this travel
package?
Sign up.
Don't sign up.

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
I see. That's unfortunate, but I'll be in the area
again later on, so let me know if you happen to
change your mind.

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
An excellent decision! Now then, as this
package is for a couple's getaway, would you
please go call your spouse?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
Whaaa? We're going on vacation, starting now?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Woohoo! I've been itchin' to go on a vacation for
a while now! I bet there's gonna be so much to
see!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOVE>C'mon, what're you standing around for? Let's
go!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Vacationing as a couple? That sounds pleasant.
<PAGE>
I've always liked to travel. Having the chance to
experience foreign cultures and fragrances
firsthand is a fine learning experience.
<PAGE>
Let us be off.

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Whoa, a vacation? Right now? Well heck, sign
me up!
<PAGE>
I've been stumped for new dishes for the
restaurant menu lately, and a shakeup to the old
routine could be just what I need.
<PAGE>
Visiting a foreign country and trying their food
should give me some inspiration, and it'll be a
good change of pace, too.
<PAGE>
Let's go!

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hm? An exotic excursion? Right now? Yes, I
think that will actually work.
<PAGE>
A vacation with you sounds wonderful,
<MYNAME>. I'm sure we'll have a grand time.
<PAGE>
Shall we be going?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
<WINDOW_INCOMPREHENSIBLE_R>We're going to take a trip right now...? Did you
hit your head or something?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Oh, we're going to fly somewhere on a plane.
That makes more sense.
<PAGE>
I did a lot of traveling before we got married.
Even been on a plane, too, so I'm used to it.
<PAGE>
Let's pack up and go.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uhh...You want to go on a vacation right this
minute? I guess I'm okay with it if you are.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>We can go whenever you're ready. I've always
wanted to visit other countries, to be honest.
<PAGE>
The town where I lived before had an airplane,
too. I had the chance to ride in it a few times.
<PAGE>
C'mon, let's go have an adventure.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SPECIAL>
Oho ho ho ho ho! An exotic vacance? Right
now? It has been aaaages since I last went on a
good trip.♪
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Why, of course I'll go. Visiting a foreign country
sounds entertaining.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R><FACE_LOSS>What? We'll be going on the travel agency's
airplane? Is that thing safe?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Ah well. I suppose we'll be just fine. Let us be
going.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Oh, a vacation sounds wonderful. Of course I'll
go. A trip might be a fountain of ideas for new
stories!
<PAGE>
In fact, just now I've thought of the beginnings
of a romance about two lovers who fly around
the world on daring adventures.
<PAGE>
Oooooh, inspiration is already bubbling up!
Come on, let's go.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOVE>
<WINDOW_PALPITATION_R>Y-you want to go on a v-vacation for two with
me? Right now?! Wh-where did this idea come
from?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LAUGH>It's thanks for being wonderful? Um, y-you're
way more wonderful than I am...
<PAGE>
But thanks. I'd love to go with you. Wait...we're
going to fly there?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>I don't like airplanes that much... Er, no. It's
nothing. Never mind. L-let's go...!

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A vacation? Right now? Wow, talk about a
surprise! Of course I want to go! I'm sure I'll get
to meet lots of animals at our destination.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>When I think of all the new animal friends I
could make, I wish I was there already. Let's go!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
A vacation starting right now? Goodness, you
really have a flair for spur-of-the-moment things.
<PAGE>
Er, nothing. I was just talking to myself. I don't
mind the vacation, but if we are leaving now, we
will not be back by the end of the day, correct?
<PAGE>
Oh? We will be going by airplane? Well, that
takes care of that concern. Let us be going,
then.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
A vacation? That sounds great! I'm sure there'll
be tons of plants I've never seen before to
examine!
<PAGE>
What? We're leaving now? Perfect! It's never too
soon to start more research. You've learned
quickly, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
Come on, let's go!

<NAME_MOB_WALTER>
Don't worry about the time required. We'll fly you
to your destination in our agency's private
airplane! You'll be there in no time at all.
<PAGE>
Let us be off!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Here we are!
<PAGE>
Man, airplanes are a really handy way to get
around.
<PAGE>
I mean, they can get us to someplace really,
really far away like this in no time.
<PAGE>
Anyways, we're here on vacation, so we don't
wanna waste any time! Let's go check out some
stuff.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>But, uh...there are so many interesting-looking
places around... Hmm, where to go...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Where do you want to go the most,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aah, we've arrived.
<PAGE>
I suppose airplanes are the key to global travel
nowadays. They certainly are convenient.
<PAGE>
If I remember correctly, it took me over three
times as long to make this trip in the past.
<PAGE>
Well, now that we're here, the next question is,
where do we go next?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Since you were the one to spring for this trip,
<MYNAME>, why don't you decide where we
should go?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
...*yaaaawn*...are we there yet?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Sorry, it's so easy for me to fall asleep in planes.
I've been short on shut-eye lately and the hum of
the engines put me right to sleep.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Now that I'm all rested up, let's go enjoy our
vacation!
<PAGE>
Where should we go? How about you decide,
<MYNAME>?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Urf...W-we've finally arrived. I think that airplane
ride gave me a little bout of motion sickness...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>No, I'm all right now that we've landed. It isn't
that bad. Are you all right?
<PAGE>
Oh, good. I'm glad.
<PAGE>
Well then, is there any particular place you
would like to visit?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Here we are.
<PAGE>
Planes really are the best for fast travel. You can
crisscross the globe in a matter of hours.
<PAGE>
So, now that we're here, what would you like to
check out? I'll let you pick.

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whew! Here we are.
<MOJI0> Country certainly feels
different, right off the bat.
<PAGE>
Since we're here, I'd like to see as many of the
sights as we can.
<PAGE>
But you decide where to go, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_ANGRY>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Ugh. That rickety plane rattled worse than a
carriage on a rocky road. We should've taken my
father's private jet.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>I'm surprised it didn't bother you, <MYNAME>.
Still, we arrived safe and sound, so I suppose
the point is moot.
<PAGE>
Now, I would love to direct you to the best
sights here, but that would hardly be amusing.
Instead, tell me where you'd like to go.
<PAGE>
I would rather be surprised by your choices than
simply choose myself. I think that will make for
a much better vacance for us.

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Mmm, traveling by airplane is so much fun. It
was so beautiful there, up above the clouds.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Now, it's time we enjoyed the sights at our
destination. And I can't forget to glean those
story ideas.
<PAGE>
Why don't you decide where we go,
<MYNAME>? That way I should be able to find
much more natural, spontaneous inspiration.

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_SAD>
<WINDOW_DISCOURAGEMENT_R>Whew...! W-we finally landed. I was sooo
scared...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>Thanks for holding my hand the whole time.
That really helped me stay calm. ♪
<PAGE>
I'll let you pick where we go. What do you
wanna see?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
We're here! Let's go look for some animals!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Oh...I'm sorry. You know how worked up I get
when animals are involved.
<PAGE>
This is supposed to be a special vacation for us,
too. I'm really sorry I was thinking all about
animals instead of us.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? You forgive me? And you'll take me to visit
some animals later, too?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Thank you! I'll let you pick where we go. I'm sure
it'll be lots of fun!

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Hee hee! Seeing you so excited to be flying, I
couldn't help but smile.
<PAGE>
It certainly does feel strange to be in a foreign
country with you. Now, where shall we begin
our sightseeing?
<PAGE>
I'll leave our itinerary up to you.

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Are we there already? I was so busy thinking
about the local flora I might find that the time
just flew by.
<PAGE>
All right, <MYNAME>, you decide where we go
from here.
<PAGE>
This is a research trip for two, after all. I'll let you
point us to our destination.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
So, where do you wanna go?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where would you like to go?

<FACE_REGER><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where should we go?

<FACE_MISTEL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Now, where shall we go?

<FACE_NADI><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where do you wanna go?

<FACE_KAMIL><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What hot spot should we hit?

<FACE_ELISE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where shall we go?

<FACE_IRIS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Any preference on where to go?

<FACE_LILIE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
What sounds fun to visit?

<FACE_MENOU><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where do you wanna go?

<FACE_ANGELA><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Where would you like to go?

<FACE_LICORICE><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Why don't you decide where we go?
Let's go see that river!
Let's go down this road to the left!
Let's walk down that tree-lined path!
Let's check out the shops!
Let's go shopping in the market!
Let's swim in the ocean!
There might be animals over there! Let's look!
Let's check out the shops!
Let's go down this road to the right!
Let's check out the shops!
Let's take a horseback ride together!
Let's check out the museum!
Let's go over to that rockfall!
Let's play in the snow!
Let's go for a walk!
Let's go down this road to the right!
Let's ride on one of the paddle-boats!
Let's go down this road to the right!
Let's go for a ride in the carriage!
Let's have a swimming race!
Let's go over there and watch the sky!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Whoa, look at how huge this river is! It's almost
as wide as an ocean! Can we swim in it? I think
I wanna go swimming!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>I'm gonna go in. Wait right there, <MYNAME>!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Wow, this is actually kinda deep. Hmm...? Oh,
hey. What's that? Lemme dive under and check.
<PAGE>
...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_INCOMPREHENSIBLE_R><FACE_LOSS>...?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R><FACE_ANGRY>...!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>Ow ow ow ow! Geez, that hurt.
<MYNAME>, could you help me up?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hup! There we go. A really huge crab snapped at
my leg down there. Could you help me drag it
up?
<PAGE>
You grab that claw, okay? Ready? One...two...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R><FACE_LAUGH>Woohoo! Lookit the size of that thing! I've never
seen a crab this huge! Let's cook it up and eat it
later.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>Man, I'm so glad you decided to check out this
place. Thanks, <MYNAME>.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>Whoa, look at that mountain over there! It's
huge!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>That travel agent guy said the snow on the top
never melts, even in the middle of summer!
<PAGE>
If we had that snow that never melted at home,
we could have snow cones every day!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh? If we took it home, it'd melt? Aww...why's
that?
<PAGE>
A difference in temperature between home and
the mountaintop, huh?
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Darn. Guess I won't be climbing up there to get
some, then. Wait...what's with the surprised
look?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Yeah, I was thinking about going to get some.
Wouldn't it be super cool to have never-melting
snow at home?
<PAGE>
Wait, what's with THAT look? It's nothing? Well,
okay then... Anyway, let's go check out what's
over there!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Hey, <MYNAME>! Check out this street!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>It's totally straight. Looks like it goes on forever,
too! Those trees lining the road are really pretty.
<PAGE>
With these trees lined up so perfectly, doesn't it
make you wanna sprint down the whole street
weaving in and out of them like cones?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Huh? It doesn't? Weird. I think just about any
guy would instantly want to do that.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>H-hey! Why're you walking off without me?
What'd I say?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>! Wait for meeeee!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R>Well, since we've come all the way out here to
Wheat Country, let's go have some pizza!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT>C'mon, let's check out this restaurant. They
should have some. Hello there!
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Look, <MYNAME>! That chef is spinning the
pizza dough around by hand, and it's getting
bigger and bigger!
<PAGE>
I wanna try that. Do you think they'll let me?
Lemme go ask!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Woohoo! <MYNAME>, they said I can! Watch
this, I'm gonna be a pizza master.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Okay, so you start spinning it with your fingers
like this...and it'll just get bigger on its own.
Here we go...
<PAGE>
Ooh, it's getting bigger. But I wanna make it
even bigger than it is now.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Wait, uh...I forgot to ask how to stop. How do I
stop the spinning? It...it's getting too big!
<PAGE>
Dwaaah! Somebody help me stop this---AAPH!
Iph on mah faaaaf!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Ipph! Ipph! C'mon, <MYNAME>. Stop laughing
and help me get it all off...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Whew! There. It was starting to get hard to
breathe. I guess making pizzas is a dangerous
pastime for amateurs.
<PAGE>
Man, now I'm hungry. How about we just sit
and eat a finished pizza instead of trying to make
one?

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Oooh...! Rose Country's street markets are
loaded with food vendors. It all looks so
delicious!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_PLEASANT_R><FACE_LAUGH>Mm! This green veggie looks really good. Huh? I
can have a taste?
<PAGE>
Awesome, don't mind if I do! A-aaahn!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_LOSS>...Mrpgh?!
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>...!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_FLAME_R><FACE_ANGRY>Aaaugh! Spicy! Hothothothot!
<PAGE>Mouth...! On fire...! Gimme water! Waterrrrr!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL>*glug* *glug* *glug* *glug* *glug*...Wheeew!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Geez, I thought I was gonna burn to death for a
second. I should watch what I put in my mouth.
Anyway, let's go check out over there.

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LOSS>
Uuuugh, Tropical Country is so hot!
<PAGE>
If we weren't swimming right now, I'd probably
shrivel up like a dusty old mummy in no time.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Oh, right. You said you wanted to go diving,
didn't you?
<PAGE>
That sounds great! Let's both go diving and see
what we can find. Whoever finds the coolest
treasure wins!
<PAGE>
Ready? One...two...!
<PAGE>
...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Pwah...! *hah*...*hahn*! Check this out, I got a
giant shrimp! What'd you find, <MYNAME>?
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_QUESTION_R><FACE_LOSS>Uh...where did you find a fish that enormous?
I...I can't believe I lost...
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_FLAME_R><FACE_ANGRY>But not for long! Best two out of three! Let's go
again!

<FACE_FRITZ><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Whoa, look at all the penguins! Hee hee...see
how hard the baby penguins are waddling to
keep up with their mamas?
<PAGE>
Ooh, and there's a polar bear! Man, I can bear-ly
believe it!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>They're all walking around on the ice, though.
Aren't their feet cold? I'd get frostbite if I had to
stay out there that long!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>The animals here in Ice Country sure are
amazing. They manage to keep cozy even when
it's freezing outside!
<PAGE>
Ooh! What's that over there? It looks interesting.
Let's go check it out, <MYNAME>!

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Wow. This river is truly vast. Being here really
gives me that "outdoorsy" feeling.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>While not "outdoorsy" per se, I've long loved
being outside. When I was younger, my friends
and I would often go camping.
<PAGE>
We decided we'd fish for our dinners instead of
bringing food, but of course, there were times
when nothing was biting.
<PAGE>
But that was a fun twist in its own right. We'd
then go foraging in the mountains...though one
can only get so full on berries alone.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hmm? You'd like to try camping sometime? All
right, we'll have to plan a wilderness excursion.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I'll invite my old friends along so you can meet
them. They're great people; I'm sure you'll get
along famously.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
While this is a very nice road we've been strolling
along, it seems to be turning into a decidedly
steep mountain path.
<PAGE>
Excellent. I was running short of materials for
some of my fragrances. I'm sure I'll be able to
find some more in these mountains.
<PAGE>
Wait right there a moment, <MYNAME>. I'm
going to go forage for some things.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Aha! I knew there would be some. I could use
this...and this. Ah, and this is a real find. Hunh!
It's a veritable treasure trove of materials.
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_EXCLAMATION_R>Hn?! This scent... It can't be. Could that
legendary fragrance be...here?!
<PAGE>
<WINDOW_DEFAULT><FACE_NORMAL><MYNAME>, look. This incense material is so
scarce it's considered legendary. Who would
have thought I could find it here?
<PAGE>
It's made from the sap of a particular tree, but
that tree is very rare. This is the one country
where it grows in the wild, it would seem.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>I never would have found it if you hadn't brought
me here. Thank you. Now, shall we continue our
exploration?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
*urf*...It seems walking hand-in-hand in public
is still something of a hurdle for me.
<PAGE>
<FACE_ANGRY>I can't help but feel everyone's gaze boring into
me. It's not like our love is any less if we don't
hold hands, right?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Owch! Owch! You needn't pinch me! Ow! Okay,
okay. Don't get so worked up.
<PAGE>
I realize no one we know is here, but I think you
may be relishing the opportunity to cling to me a
bit too much.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Ah well. For today, at least, you can do as you
like.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Though I admit, your hands are very warm.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Hm? You think I've changed my tune a bit too 
quickly? Now I'M the clingy one?
<PAGE>
True, this isn't something I'd feel comfortable
doing back at home. It's a bit unseemly for an
old fool such as myself.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>But over here, with nobody to gossip about us,
I feel like I could throw caution to the wind!
Ha ha ha!
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>
I'd be happy to walk like this for the rest of the
day, and I don't give a fig how clingy that
sounds.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Ah, an incense shop. It would be interesting to
learn what incenses are favored in other
countries. Let's go in.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>Ooh. They have some rare scents here. How
interesting...
<PAGE>
Excuse me. Can you tell me what is used in this
one? Hmm...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Would you be able to spare some of this material
for me? Thank you.
<PAGE>
<FACE_SAD>Er...my apologies. I didn't mean to ignore you.
<PAGE>
They have such rare and interesting materials
here that I couldn't help but be captivated.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I'll be more careful next time, I promise. Now
then, let's move on.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Aah, the Rose Country's markets are as
expansive and impressive as you would expect.
Such a variety of things for sale.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Fresh vegetables, fresh fish... Truly, the selection
is unparalleled.
<PAGE>
Oh, and they have fresh flowers, as well. Maybe
I should buy one or two to use in my fragrances.
<PAGE>
Amazing. This rose's scent is perfect. I must by
it.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Oh, and this flower's scent is excellent as well.
As is this one's... Ohhhh, why don't I just buy
them all?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOSS>All right, all right! You needn't get so flustered,
<MYNAME>. I'll only buy the first rose.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Now then, let's move on.

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_NORMAL>
Hm? You would like to go diving?
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>All right. I haven't done this before, so it should
prove a fun new experience.
<PAGE>
<FACE_NAME_OFF>...
<PAGE>
<FACE_LOVE>
How amazing. Who would have thought such a
wondrous world lay in wait beneath the waves?
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>Schools of small fish swimming as one. Brightly
colored fish found only in the tropics. This is the
first time I've ever seen anything like this.
<PAGE>
<FACE_LAUGH>Being underwater is like entering a different
world. The sun glittering off the surface of the
water, so far overhead...
<PAGE>
<FACE_NORMAL>I wonder... Could that marvelous scenery be
expressed as a scent? And what would I use in
it? Hmm. I'll have to ponder this.
<PAGE>
Thank you, <MYNAME>. This has given me the
seeds of an exciting new fragrance.
<PAGE>
Now then, what say we go enjoy some of the
local Tropical Country delicacies?

<FACE_KLAUS><POS_RIGHT><FACE_LAUGH>
Look over there at that polar bear. What an
amazing creature. Intimidating, too.
<PAGE>
Oh, and there are some penguins waddling
around. How cute.
<PAGE>
